verses.verse: "Come, <S%H1945><s%> everyone who thirsts, <S%H6771><s%> to the waters! <S%H4325><s%> Come, <S%H3212><s%> he who has no money, <S%H3701><s%> buy, <S%H7666><s%> and eat! <S%H398><s%> Yes, <S%H3212><s%> come, buy <S%H7666><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> and milk <S%H2461><s%> without money <S%H3701><s%> and without price. <S%H4242><s%>

Why do you spend <S%H8254><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> for that which is not bread? <S%H3899><s%> and your labor <S%H3018><s%> for that which doesn't <S%H3808><s%> satisfy? <S%H7654><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> diligently <S%H8085><s%> to me, <S%H398><s%> and eat you that which is good, <S%H2896><s%> and let your soul <S%H5315><s%> delight <S%H6026><s%> itself in fatness. <S%H1880><s%>

Turn <S%H5186><s%> your ear, <S%H241><s%> and come <S%H3212><s%> to me; <S%H8085><s%> hear, and your soul <S%H5315><s%> shall live: <S%H2421><s%> and I will make <S%H3772><s%> an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you, <S%H539><s%> even the sure mercies <S%H2617><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>
Behold, <S%H5414><s%> I have given him for a witness <S%H5707><s%> to the peoples, <S%H3816><s%> a leader <S%H5057><s%> and commander <S%H6680><s%> to the peoples. <S%H3816><s%>

Behold, <S%H7121><s%> you shall call a nation <S%H1471><s%> that you don't <S%H3045><s%> know; and a nation <S%H1471><s%> that didn't <S%H3045><s%> know you shall run <S%H7323><s%> to you, <S%H3068><s%> because of Yahweh your God, <S%H430><s%> and for the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for he has glorified you. <S%H6286><s%>"
Seek <S%H1875><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> while he may be found; <S%H4672><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> you on him while he is near: <S%H7138><s%>

let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> his way, <S%H1870><s%> and the unrighteous <S%H205><s%> man <S%H376><s%> his thoughts; <S%H4284><s%> and let him return <S%H7725><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and he will have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on him; <S%H430><s%> and to our God, for he will abundantly <S%H7235><s%> pardon. <S%H5545><s%>
"For my thoughts <S%H4284><s%> are not your thoughts, <S%H4284><s%> neither are your ways <S%H1870><s%> my ways, <S%H1870><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"For as the heavens <S%H8064><s%> are higher <S%H1361><s%> than the earth, <S%H776><s%> so are my ways <S%H1870><s%> higher <S%H1361><s%> than your ways, <S%H1870><s%> and my thoughts <S%H4284><s%> than your thoughts. <S%H4284><s%>

For as the rain <S%H1653><s%> comes down <S%H3381><s%> and the snow <S%H7950><s%> from the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and doesn't <S%H7725><s%> return there, <S%H7301><s%> but waters the earth, <S%H776><s%> and makes it bring forth <S%H3205><s%> and bud, <S%H6779><s%> and gives <S%H5414><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> to the sower <S%H2232><s%> and bread <S%H3899><s%> to the eater; <S%H398><s%>

so shall my word <S%H1697><s%> be that goes forth <S%H3318><s%> out of my mouth: <S%H6310><s%> it shall not return <S%H7725><s%> to me void, <S%H7387><s%> but it shall accomplish <S%H6213><s%> that which I please, <S%H2654><s%> and it shall prosper <S%H6743><s%> in the thing I sent it to do. <S%H7971><s%>

For you shall go out <S%H3318><s%> with joy, <S%H8057><s%> and be led forth <S%H2986><s%> with peace: <S%H7965><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and the hills <S%H1389><s%> shall break forth <S%H6476><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you into singing; <S%H7440><s%> and all the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the fields <S%H7704><s%> shall clap <S%H4222><s%> their hands. <S%H3709><s%>

Instead of the thorn <S%H5285><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> the fir tree; <S%H1265><s%> and instead of the brier <S%H5636><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> the myrtle tree: <S%H1918><s%> and it shall be to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for a name, <S%H8034><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> sign <S%H226><s%> that shall not be cut off. <S%H3772><s%>"
